page.title: 15 TRANSPORT
page.content: On Sark there are about 60 tractors.If you want to have a tractor you need a licence which costs Â£10.00 and you need to have a good reason to be allowed to own a tractor.Tractors and trailers are the main form of transport for goods on Sark. There are about 350 bicycles available for hire by visitors and most people who live on the Island also own a bike because it is the easiest way to travel.A bike licence costs Â£1.00. On no account are cars allowed on the roads.When the film "Mr Pye" was made here they were allowed to bring a car but had to remove the engine.The car was towed by tractor and was used to carry the camera. The only other form of transport on the Island are horses and carts.
